annotations.description: I’m using platformio on Ubuntu 20.4, it’s been a few months now, and I’ve just come across this problem, it says it didn’t find the python interpreter, however I was already using version 3.8.10 (/usr/bin/python3)  I have already reinstalled the extension and so far I have had no success.
annotations.title: Ubuntu vscode pio extension install: PlatformIO: Can not find working Python 3.6+ Interpreter
